product_entries.full_product_description: CONTROL PANEL & ACCESSORIES | Panel Constructional details:  Panel suitable for 415VAC,50Hz, 3Wire AC supply system fabricated in compartmentalised with CRCA sheet steel, thickness 2mm, treated with 7tank procees. Painting shall be powder coated and oven dried. Panel shall have withstand capacity of 25KA for 1 sec. Ingress protection shall be IP-42. It will have suitable MS base channel with powder coated. panel shall be fabricated in transportable section. The panel shall have a common CU earthbar of size 25mmX5mm at the rear with 2 nos earth stud. Stud type power terminal suitable for rated load to be considered. Connection to be done with PVC insulated CU conductor cable of required current rating. Paint shall be finalised during detail engineering.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: supply system: 415VAC, 50Hz, 3Wire AC, construction: compartmentalised, material: crca sheet steel, treatment: 7tank process, painting: powder coated and oven dried, withstand capacity: 25KA for 1 sec, ingress protection: IP-42, base channel: ms(mild steel) with powder coated, fabrication: transportable section, earthbar material: cu(copper), earth stud: 2 nos, terminal: stud type power terminal suitable for rated load, connection: pvc insulated cu(copper) conductor cable, paint: to be finalised during detail engineering

product_entries.full_product_description: CONTROL PANEL & ACCESSORIES | Dual Incomer with Bus-coupler: 4 Pole 100A microprocessor based O/C, S/C & E/F releases with extended door handle.  SINGLE POINT EMERGENCY STOP SHALL BE PROVIDED. Out Going feeders:  a) 8 nos 32A, 4 Pole microprocessor based MCCB power feeder with On,Off, Trip indication lamps. b) 4 nos 63A, 4 Pole microprocessor based MCCB power feeder with On,Off, Trip indication lamps.  c) 1 no 16A, 4 Pole microprocessor based MCCB power feeder with On,Off, Trip indication lamps.
product_entries.core_product_name: dual incomer with bus-coupler and outgoing feeders
product_entries.size: dual incomer: 4 pole 100A, outgoing feeders: a) 8 nos 32A 4 pole, b) 4 nos 63A 4 pole, c) 1 no 16A 4 pole
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: feature: microprocessor based O/C(over current), S/C(short circuit) & E/F(earth fault) releases, feature: extended door handle, feature: single point emergency stop, feature: MCCB power feeder with On,Off, Trip indication lamps
